original_text: But he that knew not, and did commit things worthy of stripes, shall be beaten with few stripes. For unto whomsoever much is given, of him shall be much required: and to whom men have committed much, of him they will ask the more.
korean_text: 알지 못하고 맞을 일을 행한 종은 적게 맞으리라 무릇 많이 받은 자에게는 많이 요구할 것이요 많이 맡은 자에게는 많이 달라 할 것이니라

sentences.original_text: and did commit things worthy of stripes,
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 채찍질을 받을 만한 일을 저질렀다면,

sentences.original_text: shall be beaten with few stripes.
For unto whomsoever much is given,
of him shall be much required:
and to whom men have committed much,
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 사람들이 많은 것을 위임한 자에게는,

sentences.original_text: of him they will ask the more.
sentences.korean_translation: 그들에게서 더 많은 것을 요구받을 것이다.
